Usually, the beverage industry isn't my go-to for research, but Safety Shot ( $SHOT ) caught my attention. Their focus on scientifically backed alcohol recovery with Sure Shot (aiming to rapidly reduce BAC) feels different.  
 
Plus, their recent moves like the Yerbae acquisition and strategic financial decisions are intriguing. The $1.5B+ hangover remedy market is ripe for innovation, and they might be onto something.  
 
https://chartingdaily.com/redefining-the-functional-beverage-industry
